arts.ttl: Video: Dens Park protest against Board leaves Celtic stars fuming
arts.sum: Celtic fans continued their protests against Michael Nicholson and the Celtic Board during this afternoonâ€™s meeting with Dundee. The Scottish Champions fell to a 2-0 defeat against the Dee, the first time Dundee have beaten Celtic since 1988. During the week, The Celtic Fans Collective met to discuss their next steps to achieve change at Read More
